product.title: Robin Hood Saves the Day | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Robin Hood Saves the Day

The adventures of Robin Hood and the enchanted wood of Nottingham hold a timeless appeal for young readers. In this thrilling tale, Robin Hood and Little John unite to rescue Friar Tuck, who is being imprisoned for non-payment of taxes to the greedy prince. Robin Hood and Little John must retrieve Friar Tuck from the castle’s dungeon and save him from impending doom.

Tie-in Activity: Head to the woods or to a local nature preserve with your child for a “Robin Hood” adventure hike. Take along field guides to help you identify different types of trees and flowers during your hike, and encourage him to look for rabbits, squirrels, and other wildlife.
